name: LuissUniversity
0:
”Alexa, open Luiss Agent”
”Alexa, ask Luiss Agent when is the secretariat open”
”Alexa, ask Luiss Agent what international experiences are there”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: luiss agent
des: Luiss Agent allows both students and prospective enrollers to get information about Luiss, such as Campus Life, Services, Class Schedules, Office Contact Details and Locations. Furthermore, students can directly ask Alexa specific information regarding Admissions, Summer School, Summer University, International Programs, Career Services, Scholarships, Residences & Accommodation, Cultural Activities, Library, Sport Programs.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
